linktoarchive-onion-link: Tooltip shown when hovering over an onion link label.
linktoarchive-onion-label: Text label displayed for onion links (Tor network addresses).
linktoarchive-archive-link: Tooltip shown when hovering over a web.archive.org link label.
linktoarchive-archive-label: Text label displayed for web.archive.org links.
linktoarchive-archivetoday-link: Tooltip shown when hovering over an archive.today link label.
linktoarchive-archivetoday-label: Text label displayed for archive.today links.
linktoarchive-archive-link-desc: Tooltip shown when hovering over a web.archive.org link that points to an archived version of a normal URL.
linktoarchive-archivetoday-link-desc: Tooltip shown when hovering over an archive.today link that points to an archived version of a normal URL.
